English:
What did you come here for?
Did you need another look at my pathetic self?
Chinese:
你是來幹嘛的……
是還沒看夠我不堪的樣子嗎？
Korean:
뭐하러 온 거냐…
아직 내 꼴사나운 모습을, 덜 봤다는 거냐
German:
Was suchst du denn hier?
Wolltest du mein erbärmliches Ich unbedingt ein
letztes Mal sehen?

English:
You're incredible, you know.
Always able to do the right thing straight away.
Chinese:
你真厲害呀……
不管何時都會做出正確的事情。
Korean:
넌 참 대단하다니깐…
언제나 곧장 올바른 일을 할 줄 알아
German:
Du bist toll, weißt du.
Du tust immer sofort das Richtige.

English:
But I'm not like that.
I can't do anything. Worried about how it'll look.
Chinese:
但是啊，我不像你。
瞻前顧後的話，什麼都辦不到……
Korean:
하지만 말이야, 난 그렇지 않아
폼만 잡고, 아무것도 할 줄 몰라―…
German:
Aber ich bin nicht so.
Ich kann gar nichts. Beschäftige mich nur damit,
wie ich dabei aussehe.

English:
And it ends again without me being able to help
a friend. How pathetic is that?
Chinese:
又沒救到朋友就結束了……
真遜……
German:
Und am Schluss kann ich noch nicht mal einem
Freund helfen. Erbärmlich, was?
